children.value: import { Button, Flex, IconButton, ProgressButton, Badge } from "ui";

<Flex direction={'column'}>
    <IconButton icon={'TrashIcon'} variant={'red'}>Button</IconButton>
    <IconButton icon={'TrashIcon'} variant={'green'}>Button</IconButton>
    <IconButton icon={'TrashIcon'} variant={'blue'}>Button</IconButton>
    <IconButton icon={'TrashIcon'} variant={'orange'}>Button</IconButton>
</Flex>
A button that when clicked, will display a visual indicator of progression.

<Badge>Work in progress</Badge>
<Flex direction={'column'}>
    <ProgressButton variant={'red'} progressColor={'blue'}>Button</ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={'green'} progressColor={'orange'}>Button</ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={'blue'} progressColor={'red'}>Button</ProgressButton>
    <ProgressButton variant={'orange'} progressColor={'red'}>Button</ProgressButton>
</Flex>
